devdoc.details: The contract is interacted with priceResolver.solCustom price gateway is allowed, but need to implement priceGateway.sol and set by governAccountingSystem implemented price gateway since it will handle set price by govern

addPriceGateway(address).details: This function must be called by govern, will logic occur in internal function

params.priceGateway: price Gateway address that want to whitelist

assetPrice(address,address,uint256).details: accept ETH / USD as Asset / Base Token

params.amount: Asset Amount in term of Asset decimal

isSupportedPair(address,address).details: This function not really check in gateway,since the checking will be done when setting tokenPairPriceGatewayMap

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTokenPairPriceGatewayMap(address[],ad.details: This function must be called by govern, will logic occur in internal function

params._assets: Asset List that supported by price gateway
params._bases: Base token List that supported by price gateway

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Dao Account System

addPriceGateway(address).notice: Add the price gateway to whitelist

isSupportedPair(address,address).notice: Check the token pair is support or not

setTokenPairPriceGatewayMap(address[],ad.notice: Set the price gateway which will handle the pairs of price

userdoc.notice: This contract helps managing price gateway and allow set price by govern
